page.title: 04PEOPLE IN OUR AREA
page.content: This is a{personal account.} My name is Duncan Ross.I am 10 years old and I live in Startforth.I get up at 7:30am in the morning and have cereal for breakfast.After packing my bag I clean my teeth and get ready to leave home.My Dad takes my sister,brother and me to school on his way to the surgery.After prayers,we have lessons then a break and then more lessons.Lunch is next and my favourite is spaghetti bolognaise.I like to play on the field afterwards.My mum meets me at school and as soon as I get home,I have tea and dash out to play on my bike with my friends.We watch all the birds nests and we have three baby hedgehogs.Then I play on the computer or watch television.After supper I have a bath and go to bed at 9:00pm.
